'''Move Interactive, ProduÃ§Ãµes de Software S.A.''' is a [[Portugal|Portuguese]] software and multimedia developer.
â
In their first year of operation the firm won the Madeira Inovation Prize for entrepreneurship [http://www.gamerstek.com/readarticle.php?article_id=141] {{pt icon}} and began a relationship with Gesventure, the noted Portuguese venture capital firm, that continues today.
+
In their first year of operation the firm won the Madeira Inovation Prize for entrepreneurship [http://www.gamerstek.com/readarticle.php?article_id=141] {{pt icon}} and began a relationship with Gesventure, the noted Portuguese venture capital firm, that continues today. <br>
â
In 2005 the company secured founding from PME Investimentos and Banif New Capital, allowing them to increase the peace of development for their debut project, [[Ugo Volt]], a videogame that is aimed to the international market, and if sucessfull, it will be the first of that scale to be developed by a Portuguese Company.
+
In 2005 the company secured founding from PME Investimentos and Banif New Capital, allowing them to increase the peace of development for their debut project, '''[[Ugo Volt]]''', a videogame that is aimed to the international market, and if sucessfull, it will be the first of that scale to be developed by a Portuguese Company. <br>
â
Ugo Volt, was also the first portuguese game to be featured at [[E3]] (2006) [http://www.gesventure.pt/em_destaque/move_interactive.pdf]
+
On November, 26, 2007 it released the '''[[Floribella Videogame]]''', [http://pc.ptgamers.com/noticia.asp?id_noticia=6030] {{pt icon}} based on the popular series [[Floribella]] featured in [[Sociedade Independente de ComunicaÃ§Ã£o|SIC]]. <br>
  +
Ugo Volt, was also the first portuguese game to be featured at [[E3]] (2006) [http://www.gesventure.pt/em_destaque/move_interactive.pdf] {{pt icon}}
